name: SMILE GUIDE: the apple escape
description:
New adventure awaits Agatha when it turns out the last episode is (blank). (Blank) find her own way through the mushroomland gathering APFEL®. Can you help her (blank)? Oh god, can somebody please help her (blank)! Breathe, breathe, breathe. You can't do anything, you're worthless. But hush - the secret is (blank).

A game by Wiktor Stribog

Controls:

W - forward, S - backward
